website_summaries.verdict: A well-made bellows designed to deliver high-volume air blasts to stoke your fire.
pros: Made of oak wood and faux leather
Loop for hanging.High-volume air push design
Does a good job stoking the fire

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate description and materials
customer_reviews.text: This is a HomeBasiX bellows, with a Rocky Mountain Goods sticker stuck on the box. It is conveniently stuck over the "Made in China" portion that is still visible on close inspection. This bellows is definitely not leather as listed.
customer_reviews.author: MiaJ

customer_reviews.title: It would look great hanging on a wall
customer_reviews.text: Pleather melts. Go figure. We used this for a few weeks on our wood stove and then it was too holy to muster much air. It would look great hanging on a wall, but if you want a functional bellows, you really need to get leather, which cures but dies not melt or burn with normal heat exposure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for wood
customer_reviews.text: It looks good, but I guess that makes the deception of this bellow lasting long so believable. In reality it will last only a week. Should have shipped it back to amazon for a refund. Amazon should consider selling more quality bellows, or do not have bellows on their website. It does not do the consumer, or on their bottom line, to have inferior bellows on their site due to a high turnover rate of returns on this product. If you tape the holes of the bellow you could get another week of use and eventually you can burn it for fun like I did because that was the only use I got out of this bellow.
customer_reviews.author: Ann P

customer_reviews.title: Works good - not high quality though
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Fast Shipping - thank you. Only problem is front nozzle is made of a hard plastic - so don't get it too close to hot coals because it will melt. Also, "leather like" material is not leather and real leather would be better for something being used near heat fire. Little disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Assembly Detail. Lacking quality control.
customer_reviews.text: This bellows was rated fairly high by most so that is why I chose it. This was given as a gift and when it was opened it was realized that the vinyl portion of the bellows was installed incorrectly and the bellows will not open up only to about 50% or less if it's designed volume which makes it almost useless as a bellows. I am going to return this bellows to Anazon and purchase a different one. As a side not it notes in the bold heading a "Leafher Loop for Hanging" , not photo attached, it is a very thin vinyl strap.
customer_reviews.author: jimfrer

customer_reviews.title: ... be so it is not as efficient as I'd like. But the basic quality of the bellows is ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how small this would be so it is not as efficient as I'd like. But the basic quality of the bellows is good and I've not had trouble with heat damage when pushing it into the embers to pump up the flames.
customer_reviews.author: One Fat Foodie

customer_reviews.title: Great campfire tool on the Ranch
customer_reviews.text: The bellows work just as they should. As for durability, I can't speak to that yet. I used them last weekend and they work great. If I could improve them I would want a longer stroke to be able to give a longer slower push of air. These are big improvement over the foot pump that I had been using and they'll make fire building and maintenance much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Craig P.

customer_reviews.title: Best Bellows I could find!
customer_reviews.text: These bellows really work. I needed a tool to blow on the fire. Its hard to get down on the floor and blow on the fire too. These bellows not only look beautiful but shoot a good strong blast of air into the fireplace. Fire blazes right up. May be low tech but results are outstanding. Price was right, too. PS The millennials regard these as a tool from Medieval Times. So funny!
customer_reviews.author: JILL

customer_reviews.title: Ornamental
customer_reviews.text: Purely ornamental. I got this for use, but it is falling apart. I usually take a, "well now I know" posture whenever i buy a lemon but I was angry about this. You can see in the picture that I had to tie string around it to keep pressure and the pins fell out in several places.
customer_reviews.author: brian prine

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away!
customer_reviews.text: This Bellows Is Junk! After the fourth time attempting to use it for the purpose it was falling apart. Not even sure if the "rivets" are real. One fell off! This thing is tiny! The handle is Extreamly small. I have returned this item. Starting to think about buying less from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Peter S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality for the price can't be beat
customer_reviews.text: We're replacing an aged bellows that came with our wood stove when we purchased our home. This new bellows seems sturdy and well made. In use it's functionality is many degrees better than our old one. It does exactly what it is supposed to do and does it well. For the price and quality we are more than happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dooly

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Edit: After using this for a few months, I realized, I just wasn't pumping it fast enough. I like this bellow now and it saves our fire from ddying: It works, but doesn't hold much air. Doesnt get the fire going as well as just blowing on the flame. I have to admit though, I don't get as much smoke in my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Austin R.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit reserved about this bellows at first. I thought it was going to be too small to be effective. I was wrong and it works great. Fairly lightweight and easy to use. Our first one lasted 10 years before the plastic leather cracked and we had to replace the unit.
customer_reviews.author: jhhack

customer_reviews.title: a good product overall
customer_reviews.text: not a bad product but it is on the smaller size which was a bit of a surprise. the "leather" is stiff so i am not sure how long it will last but so far it looks good and works well. the two handles are not very well aligned. it's not a deal breaker but once i noticed it i now see it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Omega

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This bellows is a great value and is very well made. I like the size and it's easy to use as well. I would definitely recommend it. It's a great addition to our assortment of fireplace accessories and helps keep our fire burning.
customer_reviews.author: L. Strand

customer_reviews.title: No more worrying about fire pit ventilation
customer_reviews.text: My buddy and I camp a lot all over Colorado. We always joked about getting a pair of bellows so that we never had to worry about finding dry wood, with bellows you can get the fire hot enough to steam out water in logs. These bellows work very well, almost too well. It led us to building, admittedly, too big of a fire. But that's nothing on the bellows, that's on our own stupidity. They're perfect for car camping, and if you have a fire starter with these bellows, you'll never have to worry about getting a fire started or keeping it going.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made in CHINA
customer_reviews.text: Somewhere in the thread of reviews a person in-the-know stated this was made in CO, or at least the US. I ordered, got the delivery, and clear as day, it’s marked Made in China. Out of desperation, I gave it a try and it’s pretty worthless. Amazon and their partners would save some money from people like me if they disclosed the country of origin. This is the 3rd fireplace tool I’m sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works awesome! Much easier and faster to get a fire burning in my old wood stove than using my lungs. Now I don’t have to stick my head halfway into the stove to get the fire going!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Cheatham

customer_reviews.title: ... came more quickly than i'd anticipated - which was nice, and the tip is not one of those ...
customer_reviews.text: The bellows came more quickly than i'd anticipated - which was nice, and the tip is not one of those cheap tin ones. It focusses the air well, and blows quite a distance in front of the bellows. It works fine, but i wish i had a larger one. A double action bellow would ROCK.
customer_reviews.author: B. Roon

customer_reviews.title: Well made with a hearty wind!
customer_reviews.text: This beautifully crafted bellow works perfectly with my wood stove. It is a mid sized, sturdy piece of fireplace equipment with a good loop.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. D.

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: I havent been able to use this yet, but I noticed that one of the pins keeping the leather secure was loose. I would recommend that the makers use something (screws?) more secure to ensure quality in their products. Functionality seems to be in place and air is successfully pushed out with ease. Even with lower quality parts this seems to be a good purchase, but I'm not sure what the longevity of this item will be like.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew T Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product, great quality and works better than any other bellow I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, was as described and works like a charm. I get a blazing fire going with little effort. These bellows are a great value for the price point. I simply could not afford the $$$$$ artisan types.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bellows
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and her husband recently updated a room in their home, including a new mantle for the fireplace. When my son-in-law casually said how nice it would be to have a set of bellows I found you. The gift will be under the tree in a couple of weeks and I know he'll be as delighted as I am with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The wood is hard and sturdy. It pushes a lot of air for the size. My only complaint is that the handles are slightly too short. But I’ve used it a lot and I’m very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: sarah on the bayou

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely made. Works well and looks great too
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made. Works well and looks great too. Made of real wood it is much nicer than a lot of the other ones available out there. I’ve had no problem with parts of it melting or falling apart. Can’t beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Richlin

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: These tongs are great, portable, sturdy and most importantly they do the job! Fold up in a convenient and compact fashion. The fireplace sets always seem to compromise with tongs that might look good but don't function well. We burn a lot of fires and these tongs make moving the logs around easy and safe.
customer_reviews.author: tjgenjoylife

customer_reviews.title: Saves me breath!
customer_reviews.text: I had been wanting one of these. Constantly hurting my lungs by blowing and breathing into the fire this saves me breath and my lungs from smoke inhalation.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: It's so small that it's a decoration, not a tool.
customer_reviews.text: This really shouldn't be called a fire bellows. It's a decoration, not a usable device. It's so small that all it does is mildly annoy the fire.
customer_reviews.author: GJW Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Big Bang for little bucks.
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty sure I purchased this before. It works amazing!! I would buy thing again. We burn wood in winter. This little beauty helps get that fire blazing!
customer_reviews.author: MammaMel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing air in a compact size
customer_reviews.text: Amazing air delivery on a compact size. More than enough delivery and doesn't crowd the tool tree
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Fair. Looks a little cheap
customer_reviews.text: I like the price. The size is a little too small. Would be much better if the strap that you hang was made of leather.
customer_reviews.author: Jack the Mule

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bellow
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice and well built bellow. I've been searching for sometime and they all appeared to be cheaply made. I took a chance and ordered this one from Rocky Mountain Good and I'm glad I did! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: MJ717

customer_reviews.title: Decorative and practical.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice hanging by the fireplace or wood stove. Really helps getting the fire going.
customer_reviews.author: Jon R

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: A very nice bellows. Fair price, quick delivery and performance as expected. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: William C.

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Well made. It’s small so if you want more air capacity order bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my brother and he is delighted with the bellows. It is of high quality and very fairly priced. It came over a week earlier than expected even though it was the busy holiday time of year. He hasn't had a chance to use it much yet but I have no reason not to give an excellent rating. If anything changes I will amend this review.
customer_reviews.author: RunnerS.

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It's smaller than I thought but it works well and it looks like a sturdy design works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: achalstr

customer_reviews.title: Bellows work great!
customer_reviews.text: Produce a lot of air. Happy so far. Seem to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Roland Reed

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: We heat with wood primarily in our woodstove. These things work, and they are much sturdier than our old ones. They are also decorative and look good hanging up.
customer_reviews.author: parojarvi

customer_reviews.title: It's okay for a small bellows but doesn't really do the job
customer_reviews.text: This is an inexpensive bellows that might work better for some but for us, it's disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: sandb365

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived early and looks as advertised. Has not had a lot of use but seems to do the job and a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: michael s

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: The size was correct. It is a bit small for what I needed. It works. I’m using it for an outdoor fireplace. I’d like to find something larger that moves more air.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte, NC

customer_reviews.title: Great gift , and works well.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my brother and he loves it! Does the job
customer_reviews.author: Coffee_Sipper15

customer_reviews.title: Very well built
customer_reviews.text: After looking everywhere we finally found a wonderful fireplace bellow. It works really well - the air stream is strong and controlled. It's also just a really pretty piece to have around. We plan to order another one for our cabin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fire Bellow
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift. They loved it. Nice size. Arrived fast. Great service. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Light my fire.
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Works great. Helps with starting gerr wood or dampwood.
customer_reviews.author: Dirt Hole Digger.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent "Rocky Mountain
customer_reviews.text: My Bellows broke after 25+ years of having it and I so desperately needed to replace it. I looked around everywhere and settled on this "Rocky Mountain Goods Fire Bellows" and I like the "Oak look" to it! It is smaller than my old one and I did find others that just were OK but now after having for over a Month now, it works excellent and looks good with my Oak furniture and I get a lot of compliments, Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jephunneh Utu

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I really need working bellows for my woodstove. These are more decorative and not very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: you can save your eyebrows lol
customer_reviews.text: great little item and I mean little , it works well and prevents your face from being burned when starting fires. this little item saves your breath and your eyebrows lol. awsome invention.
customer_reviews.author: Corina Chacon

customer_reviews.title: Not much air!
customer_reviews.text: This will work if you want short puffs of air. It almost puts our fire out from the short blasts. :(.
customer_reviews.author: zoomer

customer_reviews.title: Save your lungs, add oxygen to the fire with this
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for our wood stove and charcoal grill to get going, and save my lungs in the process. Helps get the fire started and hot to sustain for the evenings.
customer_reviews.author: I. Wayton

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to the tool rack
customer_reviews.text: First time for bellows at the hearth, which has seen lots of warm fires. Since my FEV1 has reduced, due to age as indicated on the nomograms, your bellows is a welcome relief from blowing into the pit. Nice addition to the tool rack, except bellows was eyed quickly by four chocolate labs who saw a new chew toy! Not to be. You've done a great job and bellows is a nice addition to the fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: joseph a nedley

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't open and close very wide. Air flow not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Babbs

customer_reviews.title: Happy 🔥
customer_reviews.text: The bellows are exactly what I needed to fan the flames of my dying fires. Works great and attractive too.
customer_reviews.author: Karri K.

customer_reviews.title: It seems to be holding up great! Good value
customer_reviews.text: This bellow is effective at blowing lots of air to the fire. We have rested the tip against hotness and so far there has been no melting of any part of the bellow. It seems to be holding up great! Good value.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Ain't fancy, but it works
customer_reviews.text: Pretty basic... looks nicer in photo. But my dad loves it for getting our firepit going.
customer_reviews.author: dmoz

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works even better!
customer_reviews.text: Have been looking everywhere for a sturdy yet affordable but eye appealing and well made bellow.....Rocky Mountain nailed it! It works like a charm and is super easy to use! It's perfect and so well made! High Five Rocky Mountain! Yay me!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product in small size
customer_reviews.text: Scaled down size bellows. Made of solid wood (not cheap vinyl) and seems to work fine for a small bellows. Looks nice enough to hang on tool holder with brush,poker, etc.
customer_reviews.author: xmiami

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fireplaces and outdoor fires!
customer_reviews.text: This small fire bellows is perfect for household use. Works excellently for fireplaces and outdoor fire pits. We love it and use it often for our fire pit. Well made, sturdy and compact. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Fire breather
customer_reviews.text: I wanted one that was similar to the one I had when I was growing up. This one was perfect!! It’s well made and with frequent use is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Nick R Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: The Mellow Bellows
customer_reviews.text: This product helps turn coals into flames. It also saves my lungs blowing on the coals.
customer_reviews.author: John Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: A real lung saver when rekindling a fire in my wood stove
customer_reviews.author: Arivacain

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value; works well
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value; works well. P.S. You are not supposed to stick bellows IN a fire. Any material will burn/scorch/melt if you do that.
customer_reviews.author: HibiscusBlossom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: MUCH nicer than the vinyl / particle board ones. Very pleasant surprise...
customer_reviews.author: Mark Malewitz

customer_reviews.title: 2 thumbs down.
customer_reviews.text: This bellow breaks and starts to fall apart after the first use. Made with pleather and held together with thumbtacks and staples. It still functional, but not at 100%. I definitely do not recommend this product. Plus it’s actually very small.
customer_reviews.author: Maria T.

customer_reviews.title: The listing lies ........
customer_reviews.text: Integrity issues. Listing implies that is oak and leather. It is not leather.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: An awesome bellow. I use this on my outdoor fireplace ...
customer_reviews.text: An awesome bellow. I use this on my outdoor fireplace (keep inside). I used a bellows as a child to stoke a fire. This bellow is top notch quality and is very powerful for its size. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: CLAUDE MCCULLOUGH

customer_reviews.title: these bellows have ended my annoying huffing and puffing at coals
customer_reviews.text: Well made and handsome, these bellows have ended my annoying huffing and puffing at coals. So glad to have found them here at such a good price. They came with a 5 year warranty but I doubt that would ever need to be resorted to--they look as if they are built to go the distance.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere if you want quality
customer_reviews.text: Cheap. Not high quality but gets the job done. I’ll be looking for a nicer option before next winter for sure but this will work for a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Burnett

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: OK. Not sure how long it will last however. Looks nice, a little on the small side.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Great craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Craftsmanship was awesome considering how inexpensive it is. It also does the job getting our fireplace going.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M Belt

customer_reviews.title: Great bellow
customer_reviews.text: This bellows works great in helping us get a fire started in our wood stove. Quality seems good. Great product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived when and as expected. It was a gift for my husband and he really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: tinsler

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what my dad needed
customer_reviews.text: My 82 year old dad needed a good, somewhat compact, bellows to keep his wood burning stove going without requiring him to exert too much. He says its perfect for him. Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: CheckerSTL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking and works great! I would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Please with the quality. Could use a bigger bellow, for a little longer puff.
customer_reviews.author: TwoGuys

customer_reviews.title: Not real leather!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a cheap bellows made with fake leather I had that fell apart. I bought it specifically because it said "leather". This is just another cheap bellows. There is no leather on this thing. False advertising. I'm not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get a fire going.
customer_reviews.text: It makes starting my fire in the woodstove so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL MACDEVITT

customer_reviews.title: great fireplace accessory
customer_reviews.text: With this bellows, all I need now is just a little kindling, a piece of newspaper, and a match to get a blaze going quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Yoder

customer_reviews.title: prompt  delivery
customer_reviews.text: appreciated fast delivery of fire bellows. It is winter with lots of snow so love having a real wood burning fireplace and the bellow keeps the flame going. Thanks for prompt delivery
customer_reviews.author: barbara kortes

customer_reviews.title: i also like the way it looks
customer_reviews.text: we ordered the bellows to help with our outdoor fireplace - it is exactly as stated...the fire lasts a bit longer since we can make the coals glow a little longer! i also like the way it looks!
customer_reviews.author: elaine m.

customer_reviews.title: Small yet functional
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't put out a lot of air since it's so small but it is storable and works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: fun guy

customer_reviews.title: Nice bellows and good value
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sized bellows for my fireplace. I have two wood-burners on different floors, and I do plan to buy a second one just like it, because it is very attractive and seems to be very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Product barely pushes any air out at a time and has cheap plastic you can't put anywhere near a flame. Not worth the effort! Waited too long to get my money back so now I'll probably just throw it away...
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Hull

customer_reviews.title: Great price/great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine product that is exactly as represented.....what’s not to like?!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: My purchase was a gift for my sister. It was exactly what she wanted. Service was very fast and I was very happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi6

customer_reviews.title: Little bellows that could!
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size! For a small fireplace bellows this little guy is perfect for your home when your fire needs a little boost. For the $$ you can’t go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Groupp

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The price and quality are good. Highly recommend if you want a good fireplace bellows. I use my fireplace a couple of times a week and I have also used the bellows on my outdoor fire pit with great results.
customer_reviews.author: Zullo

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it for about a month and do far it seems to be good quality. I suppose the test will be how it stands up after time.
customer_reviews.author: Tina-Marie Romano

customer_reviews.title: Okay for decoration
customer_reviews.text: Too small to be functional. You could burp more air than this thing puts out.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Iddins

customer_reviews.title: Good product! The wood is high quality oak
customer_reviews.text: Good product! The wood is high quality oak. My only concern, is I could use a bigger one. The price point is excellent. I use it a lot stoking the fire in both the fireplace and grill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bellow. Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This bellow is small, but feels handcrafted and works great. Makes life easier if you have to constantly have fires to keep warm in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Patterson

customer_reviews.title: works pretty well for it's size
customer_reviews.text: It is much smaller than it looks on website. I was hoping for a larger bellow.
customer_reviews.author: William H

customer_reviews.title: Quality, but too small
customer_reviews.text: The item is made from quality materials and it feels well built, but it's interior air capacity is so small that it barely produces enough airflow to effective.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great bellows for home fireplace
customer_reviews.text: We like the size and weight of this bellows. It's not to bog liked others, but it's pretty powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Luvto Reed

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: I use the bellows to start fires in my small wood burner. It moves an adequate volume of air for that purpose. I am not sure it would be large enough to use in a full size fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Linestretcher

customer_reviews.title: We use this bellows for our wood stove and are very happy with. Good product and good price
customer_reviews.text: The Rocky Mountain Goods Fire Bellows was exactly as it appeared and just what we were looking for. We use this bellows for our wood stove and are very happy with. Good product and good price!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect. And I like the build. Good deal, plain and simple.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy W. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Two for one
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an Xmas present and we opened it and tested functionality and bought a second one for ourselves!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

product_meta.title: Rocky Mountain Goods Fire Bellows - Oak Wood - Loop for hanging - Air efficient design for heating up fire quickly
product_meta.description: Save your breath and stoke up your fire with the Rocky Mountain Goods Fire Bellows. This wood and leather fireplace bellows is easy to use and gives more than sufficient air to keep your fire roaring. When not in use, the bellows comes with a leather hang strap. We are confident in the quality of this bellows which is why it comes with a lifetime warranty.
feature_bullets: Oak Wood and Faux Leather Construction

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars412 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
